div.div:
Collection: GET /users
Item: GET /users/{id}
Nested: GET /users/{id}/orders
Filter: GET /users?status=active
✓ Use nouns (not verbs)
✓ Use plural names
✓ Use lowercase
✓ Use hyphens (not underscores)

what actions are
available
